sentences.sContent: It wasn’t a very kind thing to say.
She’s a very kind and generous person.
sentences.sCn: 她是个很和蔼大方的人。

sentences.sContent: We thanked the priest for his kind words.
sentences.sCn: 我们对牧师亲切的话语表示感谢。

sentences.sContent: Thank you for your help. You’ve been most kind (= said when thanking someone very politely ).
sentences.sCn: 谢谢您的帮助，您真是太好了。

sentences.sContent: Ms Jarvis is unable to accept your kind invitation.
sentences.sCn: 贾维斯女士无法接受您的盛情邀请。

synos.tran: 和蔼的；宽容的；令人感激的

words.tran: 亲切的；和蔼的；体贴的；爽快的

trans.tranCn: 善良的， 亲切的， 和蔼的， 仁慈的
trans.tranOther: saying or doing things that show that you care about other people and want to help them or make them happy
one of the different types of a person or thing that belong to the same group
